He pulled my hair a lot harder than it should have been pulled, like he, okay I can understand having sex but I mean like, not, not that we were having sex but I mean like if you're all into it and you pull hair a little bit, like my ponytails just like a little bit, whatever. But he would pull it to where it would rip my hair, and then sometimes he would pick me up and like throw me whichever way he wanted me, and then he would just like use a toy or like his hand or whatever. Never his penis though, ever, I never had sex with him. But um

DETECTIVE:
But you're a little girl, I mean, so,

I'm little, so he could pick me up, like, if you pick me up and throw me, obviously it's gonna hurt. If I get hurt, um

DETECTIVE:
Did you ever tell him that hurts you?

No.

DETECTIVE:
No?

No. I wasn't

DETECTIVE:
//When he was doing these things for you, kissing, touching, inserting his fingers, oral, did he ever hurt you down there? In your vagina area?

Um, I don't know, I'm sure he was a little rough on occasions, but none specifically, nothing that really stands out. I mean, there's been nights that I walked out of there barely being able to walk, um, from him being so rough but nothing really, nothing specific that he really got violent with. Like, I can't really recall.

DETECTIVE:
//Nothing that you'd have had to

Nothing that I would be like oh my god, this one time he did this, like nothing like that.

DETECTIVE:
Okay. Nothing that you'd have to go to the doctor for, the day, you know.

Nothing that I went to the doctor for, no. I mean, I remember getting tore up a few times but it was nothing that

DETECTIVE:
By tore up you mean?
